entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
